channel.title: Getting cannon to shoot npcs

item.title: Getting cannon to shoot npcs
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

ok, im using oblakastouf’s multi cannon tut, and everything worked fine when i added it.
but i wanted it to attack npcs, not player.
so, i made it look like this:

switch(objectID) { case 6: // The Object case if(actionTimer <= 1){ if(cannonowner() == true){ inCombat(); attackNPCSWithin(7, 25, 10); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("THAT MUST HAVE HURT!!!"); actionTimer = 25; } else { sendMessage("This isn't your cannon..."); } } else { sendMessage("Jesus this thing can't shoot THAT fast!"); }

where the:

attackNPCSWithin(7, 25, 10);

is, i put it there so it hits npcs.
i checked for the void for “attackNPCSWithin” stuff, and i have it and followed what it meant.
now, whenever i use the cannon to make it attack an npc, i disconnect! whats wrong?

Read full topic
